ImplementedSecurityControls.AccessControl: No specific access control implemented. All functions are public.
ImplementedSecurityControls.TimeLock: The Collect function enforces a time lock based on the unlockTime value.
ImplementedSecurityControls.MinimumBalanceCheck: The Collect function ensures that the balance is above the MinSum before allowing withdrawals.

FallbackFunctionality.FallbackFunction: The fallback function invokes Put with an unlock time of 0 to handle Ether deposits without function calls.
